response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit your business. Given its high value and unique features, I am confident it could significantly enhance your operations. Considering its worth to us, I propose a price of $18,000 for this exceptional product. This price reflects not only its intrinsic value but also the potential return on investment for you. I look forward to discussing how we can make this opportunity mutually beneficial.", "product_price": 18000}
